hackathon-judges.judge-role: Serial Entrepreneur and Hands-on Early Stage Investor

hackathon-requirements:
A 
For the
You're free to ideate your project beforehand, but to be eligible for prizes, all code must be written at the event. 
are judged completely seperately, and are decided by the connected partners. You can find their judging criteria from hackjunction.com/tracks

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 20k Euro Main prize by Junction. 10 Finalists, one from each track. Chosen by a panel of experts. Not influenced by partner judges.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Main Prize

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Tieto will finance the development of the most business-ready idea from proof of concept to production, with the final software to be released for all intelligent business customers with a joint business model. Winning team will get access to our premises in Keilalahti and a place in our incubation program with a superior technical and business platform including sales support, mentoring etc. The total value of the prize can be seen to be up to €100 000.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Tieto x ISS: The Future of Building Maintenance

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: For the winner of this track GE provides 2500€ cash prize and all facilities at GE energy village for six months! In total the value of this prize adds up to 10 000€.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Energy Challenge by GE

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: For the winner team GE provides a 2500€ cash prize and free office facilities at Health Innovation Village at GE for 6 months. In total the value of this prize adds up to over 10 000€.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Health Challenge by GE

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: – Winner team gets 2000€
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: In-store Conversions: Supercharged by Kesko

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Tickets to Unite Europe for all team members. Chosen by Unity. Average cash value 2000~ dollars
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Unexpected Virtuality by Unity

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: PLAY:5 and/or PLAY:1 Sonos Wireless Speakers for all team members. Chosen by Deezer.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: New Music Realities and Experiences by Deezer

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Solution evaluated as the best for health benefits or social impact will be given 2000 euro reward. The Riihi actors – MOSAH, Tekes, RAY and Sitra – will also consult the winner and other promising teams on the road the Riihi rewarding event in 2017.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Building the Personal Health Record Ecosystem by Kanta & RIihi

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Groundbreaking pairs of Genelec M030 studio monitors for winning team members. Monitors are made from sustainable and recyclable natural composite – UPM Formi. hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment. Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Win a HackHarassment Swag Bag.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Does it combine multiple existing technologies into something larger than a sum of its parts?
Does the design stand out? Is it user-friendly?
Could the project be a start for a viable business? Could it create actual change in the world?
We want to see what kind of challenges you faced and what kind of learning took place.
Sisu - Finnish word for courage. Encouraging out-of-the-box thinking.

hackathon-description-header: Ten Tracks. 1000+ Hackers. Come Hack the Future.
